item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Spencer and live in Phoenix Arizona where I experiment with new technology and different forms of working with data. I have a bachelor’s degree in decision sciences and have worked in the analytics field since 2014.

item.title: Writings
item.description: Some of the public blog posts and published articles I’ve written. Pandas Sort: Your Guide to Sorting Data in Python Sneaker Data Pipeline - Grailed Listings Pandas Functions - Heavy Rotation Scraping 180k Luxury Fashion Products with Python
Crypto Domains zpencer.tez zpencer.sol zpencer.near DEX Dashboard CryptoSlam Web App built with Plotly’s Dash framework
